title: args: impossible to Parse() a subset of the arguments
body:
by **flozano**: 
I have a command-line app which uses
<executable> command [arguments]

I cannot use args.Parse() because it will take "command" for everything. It'd
be great if, in Parse method, you could either specify a range where the parameters to
be parsed are located, or an array to be used instead of the whole os.Args
